content.question: The use of the phrase "certain truths" (paragraph 3, sentence 5) has the effect of

choices.label: characterizing the speaker as intentionally deceptive
forcing the reader to infer from earlier material what the phrase means
repeating the earlier references in paragraph 3 to "encomium" (sentence 3) and "adulation" (sentence 4)

content.answer: forcing the reader to infer from earlier material what the phrase means
